Jake Dawkins

Software Engineer. Communicator. Home Barista and Ametuer Photographer.

Hello! I'm a curious software engineer, with experience across the stack. I've worked with React and GraphQL-based products for much of my career, but I've also built editor extensions and CLI tools for a broad audience. Lately, I've been focusing on web accessibility, and pursuing my IAAP certifications.
